name: SOCIAL ASPIRATION FOR PARTICIPATORY REFORMS BY EVOLVED MANPOWER (SAPREM)

address: 11, Panchshil Building, Opp. Nutan Hindi High School,

briefDescription: SAPREM is engaged in identifying the impact of socio-economic issues and strive for social, educational and economic well being of the human beings in the society by ensuring community participation social work methods. SAPREM-NGO is a grass-root social service provider working in the field of education, health and community empowerment. SAPREM initiated its activities since 1998 by the group of Social work professionals, and providing services for Rural and Urban community development. It has a huge geographical spread throughout the urban and rural Maharashtra. The core competencies of its institution lie in Education, Health, Training & Community Empowerment.
